vlive.korean: [그건 사양] - 맛있으면 바꿀래? - 아니 - 왜? [No thank you] - Will you exchange with ours? - No. - Why? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] "CIX 빙수" (씨아이엑스 : CIX)
vlive.english: [No thank you] - Will you exchange with ours? - No. - Why?

vlive.korean: "움켜쥘 수 있나요?" 어... 사양할게요. "Can I squish him?" Oh... No thank you. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 달 달 무슨달?
vlive.english: "Can I squish him?" Oh... No thank you.

vlive.korean: [관심 사양] 순간... For a second... 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처 ep88_모두를 당혹잼에 빠트린 광수의 말버릇!?
한 형 사양해요? "Han, I 'refuse' you?" 듣기 View video Stray Kids : SK-TALK TIME
사양해요... - 그래 나를 사양하는구나. Refuse... - So you "refuse" me. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : SK-TALK TIME

examples.korean: We want the machine manufactured to our own spec. 발음듣기 우리는 그 기계가 우리 자신의 사양에 맞춰 제작되기를 바란다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We want the machine manufactured to our own spec. 발음

examples.korean: The house has been built exactly to our specifications. 발음듣기 그 집은 정확히 우리 사양대로 지어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The house has been built exactly to our specifications. 발음

examples.korean: I offered to give them a lift but they declined. 발음듣기 내가 그들에게 태워 주겠다고 했지만 그들이 사양했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I offered to give them a lift but they declined. 발음

examples.korean: The government was accused of propping up declining industries. 발음듣기 정부가 내리막을 걷는[사양] 산업들을 지원했다는 비난을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government was accused of propping up declining industries. 발음

examples.korean: But as the knitwear business trickled to a stop in the 1980s ― mostly due to competition from China ― the market died with it. 발음듣기 그러나 니트의류 사업이 1980년대에 들어와 중국과의 경쟁으로 인해 사양산업이 되자 시장도 함께 죽었다. The Korea Times
examples.english: But as the knitwear business trickled to a stop in the 1980s ― mostly due to competition from China ― the market died with it. 발음
